text:
Drawing a trendline on a chart can help to identify whether a trend is continuing
or reversing. In an uptrend, a trendline connects the increasing lows in price. In a
downtrend, the trendline connects the decreasing highs in price. When the price crosses
the trendline by what the analyst considers a significant amount, a breakout from a
downtrend or a breakdown from an uptrend is said to occur. Either a breakout or a
breakdown may signal the end of the previous trend.
